name: 易听/EasyListen
description: 易听是一款轻量级、易用的 Chrome 扩展，专为兼容本地和远程的 OpenAI TTS API 标准而设计。它能够快速将文本转换成自然流畅的语音,方便用户以听觉方式获取信息。无论您是想朗读网页内容、学习语言、辅助阅读，还是帮助有阅读障碍的朋友无障碍地享受阅读的乐趣,易听都是您的理想选择。EasyListen is a lightweight and user-friendly Chrome extension specifically designed for compatibility with local and remote OpenAI TTS API standards. It can quickly convert text into natural-sounding speech, making it convenient for users to get information by listening. Whether you want to read web content aloud, learn a language, assist in reading, or help friends with reading disabilities enjoy reading without barriers, EasyListen is your ideal choice.
